Recall Gran Max 1.5L: Perbaikan 14 Jam, Daihatsu Beri Kompensasi
02 Nov 2019, 03:32 by Tempo.co, Wawan Priyanto
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - PT Astra Daihatsu Motor (ADM) melakukan penarikan kembali Daihatsu Gran Max 1.5L dan Luxio buatan Maret 2018 hingga April 2019. Penyebab penarikan kembali atau recall adalah connecting rod yang diduga mudah patah sehingga menyebabkan mesin Gran Max 1.5L dan Luxio mati secara mendadak saat digunakan untuk berkendara.
“Dari enam laporan yang masuk, connecting rod bermasalah. Ada potensi patah yang dapat menyebakan mesin mati saat digunakan berkendara,” kata Anjar Rosjadi, Technical Services Division Head PT ADM.
Menurut Anjar, waktu perbaikan di bengkel resmi Daihatsu memakan waktu sekitar 14 jam. Pada saat perbaikan, connecting rod yang berjumlah empat unit seluruhnya akan diganti baru. “Kalau dihitung secara nominal, biaya perbaikain per unit (mobil) sekitar Rp 6 jutaan. Tapi ini gratis untuk konsumen yang mobilnya terdampak,” ujar dia.
Direktur Marketing PT ADM Amelia Tjandra menambahkan bahwa dalam proses perbaikan ini konsumen yang terdampak dan melakukan perbaikan di bengkel resmi Daihatsu akan mendapatkan kompensasi berupa voucher paket ganti oli mesin gratis untuk service berikutnya.
“Program (recall) ini merupakan salah satu bentuk perhatian dan tanggung jawab kami dalam memastikan mobil yang sudah menjadi milik pelanggan pun tetap terjaga keamanan dan kenyamanannya,” kata Amel.
Amel juga memastikan bahwa Daihatsu Gran Max 1.5L dan Luxio yang sudah berpindah tangan alias dijual tetap akan mendapatkan pelayanan yang sama, yakni gratis penggantian connecting rod.

Recall Gran Max 1.5L: Repair 14 Hours, Daihatsu Give Compensation
02 Nov 2019, 03:32 by Tempo.co, Wawan Priyanto
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - PT Astra Daihatsu Motor (ADM) made a recall of Daihatsu Gran Max 1.5L and Luxio made in March 2018 to April 2019. The reason for the recall was recalling the connecting rod which was thought to be easily broken, causing the Gran Max 1.5L engine and Luxio died suddenly when used for driving.
"From the six reports that came in, the connecting rod had problems. There is a potential for a break that can cause the engine to die when driving, "said Anjar Rosjadi, PT ADM Technical Services Division Head.
According to Anjar, the repair time at the official Daihatsu workshop takes around 14 hours. At the time of repair, all four connecting rod units will be completely replaced. "If calculated in nominal terms, the cost of repair per unit (car) is around Rp 6 million. But this is free for consumers whose cars are affected, "he said.
Marketing Director of PT ADM Amelia Tjandra added that in this repair process affected customers who make repairs at the official Daihatsu workshop will receive compensation in the form of a free engine oil change package voucher for the next service.
"This (recall) program is one form of our attention and responsibility in ensuring that cars that are already owned by customers are kept safe and comfortable," Amel said.
Amel also ensured that Daihatsu Gran Max 1.5L and Luxio who had changed hands or sold will still get the same service, which is free connecting rod replacement.
